column4: is anyone familiar with: Dependency is not satisfiable: libgnome2.0-cil (>= 2.16.0) ?
you need a version of libgnome2.0-cil newer than or equal to 2.16.0
and how am I able to get the package name?
try looking in the PPAs for it
sounds like whatever you're installing has outdated dependencies
it would be better to find a better version of the package
guess there isnt any, + there isnt a source available
report the bug to the package maker?
I could.... though I guess they wont be bothered:p
it can draw simple windows, but window managers like compiz and metavity actually manage the windows and decorate them
windows doesn't use X or anything like it.  almost everything is in explorer or the windows kernel
vista does have dwm as well
